page.title: 06FECKENHAM COFE FIRST SCHOOL4
page.content:
A DAY AT SCHOOL- A PUPIL
I got up and got dressed. My Mum did my hair. Iwas half way through my breakfast of cornflakes and toast when Dad was ready to take us. I was quite excited because the Nursery kids were coming to visit today and my sister was coming. I got to school quite early and played in the playground. When the bell went we went in. It was Thursday so we did English. At 10.15 the Nursery arrived and my sister was there. I looked after her at playtime. After play we sang them some songs from our concert and I played Londons Burning on the recorder. I can play it without looking at the music. Then we had dinner, it was meat, salad and chips. In the afternoon I played football with the boys. I got a bruise. Then we went home.
